long_description: A classic tote for women on the go, the Timbuk2 Valencia Hobo Bag is embellished with functional details such as an easy-access slip pocket for your phone and a water-bottle pocket. Zip-top closure secures your belongings in the roomy main compartment. Shoulder strap adjusts for wearing over the shoulder or cross-body. Front slip pocket fits your phone, cards and keys; internal water-bottle holder keeps your bottle upright so it won't spill. internal slip pocket secures stow-away items with a rip-and-stick closure. Timbuk2 Valencia Hobo Bag features ruching for feminine style.
short_description: A classic tote for women on the go, the Timbuk2 Valencia Hobo Bag is embellished with functional details such as an easy-access slip pocket for your phone and a water-bottle pocket.
